About Me

Along with my degree in Computer Engineering, I recently completed an intensive back-end bootcamp at Re:Coded, enhancing my expertise in programming and learning a new language. My enthusiasm and keen interest in becoming a full-stack developer drive my continuous self-improvement. I'm passionate about continuous learning and adapt quickly to change. My experience includes working in sizable teams, meeting tight deadlines, and thriving in dynamic environments.
